Metadata.name: Framerate unLimiter
Metadata.author: Sewer56, AnimatedSwine37, Pixelguin
Metadata.description:
Disables the built-in framelimiter, uncapping the framerate in Fullscreen and Borderless mode.
For best results with Nvidia GPUs, set "Preferred refresh rate" to "Highest available" for P4G.exe in Nvidia Control Panel.
Open the GameBanana link for more troubleshooting solutions.
